title: Qoe Data details information - common
description: Qoe Data details information that is present in both collection and reporting datatypes.

xdm:droppedFrames.title: Dropped Frames
xdm:droppedFrames.description: The number of frames dropped during playback of the main content.

xdm:framesPerSecond.title: Frames Per Second
xdm:framesPerSecond.description: The current value of the stream frame-rate (in frames per second). The field is mapped to the fps field on the close call and can be accessed through processing rules.

xdm:timeToStart.title: Time To Start
xdm:timeToStart.description: Describes the duration (in seconds) passed between video load and start.
